title: Watching paint dry minus the fumes
review:
This has a 7.5 rating?! WTF?
This was dark, gloomy, sad, and BORING!Just plain terrible.

title: Flat, dull, over acted
review: Just plain bad. It is painfully slow. The characters are so under developed that you don't care what happens to them. It's just awful.

title: 5 stars for the humor none for the directing
review:
There were some hilarious moments, however overall it was a snooze-fest and another of Spike's soap box, hateful, propaganda political tirades.
The story could have been a good one.You know who can break down racial divides, Chris Rock, or Eddie Murphy. Those guys can have EVERY person in the room on the same page. You don't have to bring up racism with hatefulness. It pushes people back. The opposite of what the world needs right now.

title: So quiet you could sleep through it
review:
What a snoozer. This film had two speeds; slow and much slower.
Having trouble sleeping? No worries, wind this pile of crap up and you'll be down in no time...or sure as hell wish you were.
